item.ars_zero.novice_spell_staff.desc: A novice magical staff that can cast spells in three phases: Begin, Tick, and End. Only Tier 1 glyphs are available.
item.ars_zero.mage_spell_staff.desc: A mage magical staff that can cast spells in three phases: Begin, Tick, and End. Only Tier 1 and Tier 2 glyphs are available.
item.ars_zero.archmage_spell_staff.desc: An archmage magical staff that can cast spells in three phases: Begin, Tick, and End. Only Tier 1, Tier 2, and Tier 3 glyphs are available.
item.ars_zero.creative_spell_staff.desc: A creative magical staff that can cast spells in three phases: Begin, Tick, and End. All glyphs are available.
item.ars_zero.dull_circlet.desc: A dull trinket, cannot be worn. Used for crafting.
ars_zero.tooltip.dull: A dull trinket, cannot be worn. Used for crafting.
item.ars_zero.spellcasting_circlet.desc: A circlet that channels spells from your head slot with Begin, Tick, and End phases.
ars_zero.alert.multiphase_turret.multi_p: Multiphase turrets require a multi-phase spell device.
ars_zero.alert.multiphase_turret.no_spel: Could not read spell data from that device.
ars_zero.alert.multiphase_turret.empty_s: Select a device slot containing at least one phase spell.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.effect_windshear: Conjures a wind voxel when used with Conjure Voxel
ars_zero.glyph_desc.effect_conjure_bligh: Places blight liquid at a location.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.select_effect: Selects a target entity or block without performing any action.
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.select_effect_g: Increases the area of blocks that can be selected
Increases the depth of blocks that can be selected
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.conjure_voxel_e: Increases the duration the voxel remains.
Places a voxel at a target entity's position.
Increases the voxel's size up to level 2, boosting water output.
Splits the voxel into multiple smaller entities.
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.push_effect_gly: Adds 10 degrees of spread per Randomize augment
Pushes from the direction between caster and target entity
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.anchor_effect_g: Increases the distance from the player
Decreases the distance from the player
Freezes target in initial relative position
Rotates the target to match your look direction
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.effect_beam_gly: Makes the beam pass through entities
Stops the beam from hurting entities
Increases the radius of the circle when using Split
ars_zero.glyph_desc.effect_beam: Compresses mana into a violent beam; resolves the remainder of the spell on each hit, draining mana per hit.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.sustain_effect: Extends the lifespan of a target
ars_zero.glyph_desc.glyph_sustain_effect: Extends the lifespan of a target
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.sustain_effect_: Adds an additional tick per level
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.effect_conjure_: Increases the radius of targeted blocks.
Increases the depth of targeted blocks.
Extends the duration of the effect.
Places blight at a target entity's feet.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.temporal_context_for: A cast method that provides access to the context of the previous spell phase
ars_zero.glyph_desc.near_form: Casts the spell at a short distance in front of your gaze
ars_zero.glyph_desc.glyph_conjure_voxel_: Conjures a small block-like entity that can inherit elemental properties.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.anchor_effect: Maintains the relative position of the target(s) to the caster
ars_zero.glyph_desc.glyph_anchor_effect: Maintains the relative position of the target(s) to the caster
ars_zero.glyph_desc.push_effect: Pushes the target in the direction you're looking.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.glyph_discard_effect: Discards non-living entities. Useful for removing Arcane Voxels.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.enlarge_effect: Increases the size of the target entity [NB: only works on Voxels so far]
ars_zero.glyph_desc.zero_gravity_effect: Temporarily removes gravity from the target, restoring it once the effect ends.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.glyph_zero_gravity_e: Temporarily removes gravity from the target, bringing it back when the spell expires.
effect.ars_zero.zero_gravity.description: Temporarily removes gravity from the entity
ars_zero.glyph_desc.effect_convergence: Concentrates a large amount of mana into a single point.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.glyph_effect_converg: Creates a powerful convergence point that can be augmented with other effects.
ars_zero.effect_augment_desc.effect_conv: Megasplosion: Creates an enormous explosion that charges over time. Fire Power affects charge rate, explosion radius and ignition (at 8+ turns into Extinguishing Soulfire Explosion). AOE determines radius. Amplify increases damage (to blocks/entities). Dampen decreases damage and radius.
Sacred Conjure Water: Fills a large area with water from bottom to top. Water Power affects placement speed. AOE determines radius. Drains mana per block placed.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.effect_geometrize: Resolve forwarded spell in a geometric structure pattern. Needs to be combined with other glyphs
ars_zero.glyph_desc.glyph_effect_geometr: Resolve forwarded spell in a geometric structure pattern. Needs to be combined with other glyphs
ars_zero.effect_augment_desc.effect_geom: Place Terrain: Creates a structure with blocks defined by regular Conjure Terrain augments/effects. Drains mana per block placed.
Break Structure: Breaks blocks in a geometric pattern. Drains mana per block broken.
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.effect_geometri: Generates cube shapes (default). When flattened, produces squares.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.augment_hollow: Hollows out the geometry, only creating the outer shell.
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.effect_geometri: Hollows out the geometry, only creating the outer shell.
Generates spherical shapes. When flattened, produces circles.
ars_zero.glyph_desc.augment_flatten: Projects a 3D shape into 2D based on the caster's look direction at resolve time.
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.effect_geometri: Projects 3D shapes into 2D based on the caster's look direction.
Processes blocks from bottom to top instead of top to bottom.
Processes blocks from bottom to top instead of top to bottom.
ars_zero.augment_desc.effect_geometrize_: Processes blocks from bottom to top instead of top to bottom.
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.effect_geometri: Increases the casting speed of the Golem. Speeding up makes the Golem faster.
Increases the casting speed of the Golem. Speeding up makes the Golem faster.
Decreases the casting speed of the Golem. Slowing down makes it slower.
Decreases the casting speed of the Golem. Slowing down makes it slower.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.adding.phas: %s is not usable in this phase.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.exists.phas: %s is not usable in this phase.
ars_zero.gui.casting_style.symbol_auto.t: Replaces the inner symbol with that for each school of magic depending on current school of magic.
ars_zero.page1.overview: Ars Zero extends Ars Nouveau with multiphase spellcasting, allowing devices such as Spell Staves and Spellcasting Circlets to chain multiple spells in sequence.
ars_zero.page1.spell_phases:
A phase is a description of a lifecycle of an incantation with multiple spells. Where spells hold multiple glyphs, devices that are multi-phased hold multiple spells, though these are always fired in sequences; begin, tick and end.

Once a device - such as a Spell Staff - begins being used, it fires the begin phase, once. Every subsequent tick, the "tick" phase executes the spell it holds. Upon stopping, finally the end phase's spell is performed.

Additionally, it is possible to configure the delay the tick phase has by scrolling the icon on the tick row.
ars_zero.page1.phase_targeting:
Because spells work completely in isolation, you must use the special form "Temporal Context" in order to do something with the previous phase's target.

For example, you can conjure a voxel in "begin", and have Temporal Context in your "tick" with Anchor, then Temporal Context with Push in your "end" phase.

This will allow you to create, aim and fire a projectile in the direction you're aiming.
ars_zero.examples.gravity_gun.quote: "You can call it Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator, if you really want to."
ars_zero.examples.tier2_teleportation.qu: "Why walk, when you can conjure a ball of mana and swap places with it?"
ars_zero.examples.ekusupuroshon.quote: "Darkness blacker than black, and darker than dark"
ars_zero.examples.mage_march.quote: "Never touch the ground againâ€”or at least not until the blocks expire."
